Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of Pope Kyrillos:

Text.Language: Papa Abba Kurilloc pimah ^#: pim~akarioc â€™qen oumeym/i: v/etaf tajron qen pinah]: n~oryozoxoc n~tav~m/i.
Pope Kyrillos the sixth: the truely honored: who founded us in the true: orthodox faith.

Ouran n~sousou pe pekran: w~ pimona,oc ettoub/out: pimand~rit/c ettajr/out: pis~v/r n~niana,writ/c.
Your name is a pride: O pure monk: the strengthened hermit: the friend of the anchorites.

Eybe vai akswpi nan: n~outupoc qen p~caji: qen ]agap/: qen pijinmosi: qen pitoubo qen v~nah].
For you have become: a leading example: of words, love, and deeds: and of purity in faith.

<ere pimainefs/ri: v/etaftal[o n~n/etswni: afer p~rov/teuin n~nis~v/ri: ouoh nidumwn afhitou e~bol.
Hail to you loving father: who healed the sick: and foresaw miracles: and cast out demons.

Fc~marwout n~je pekbioc: w~ peniwt m~makarioc: aktacyo nan m~picwma n~abba Markoc: ouoh aki~ri m~pimuron eyouab.
Your era was blessed: O our honored father: you restored St. Mark's relics: and made the sacred Myron

Maria ]macnou]: acouwnh qen ounis] n~s~v/ri: nem ni[~rompi nem nic~yoinoufi: qen tecekk~l/cia qen Zaitoun.
Mary the Mother of God: appeared miraculously: with doves and incense: above her church in Zeitoun.

You built a new cathedral: and St. Minaâ€™s great monastery: and many more churches: but you remained humble.

Saktwnk m~b~nau n~sorp: â€™qen tekjom nem nekswni: eyrek hwc nem niaggiloc: nem n/eyouab etekmenritou.
You rose at dawn: both in health and sickness: to praise with the angels: and your beloved saints.

And now remember us: before our God: that He may keep us: in His love and faith.
